passage_text: Spell to bring someone back with honey. To Attract a Love one… You will need a photograph of your love one. Pure Honey 100% from the bees. A Red Piece of Clothe A clear cup with a lid A Red Pen. This need to be done in a Tuesday or Friday…. Now the Day that your ready to cast this spell I need you to grab his or her photograph and concentrate on him coming back to you. Open the cup, write his or her complete name with the red pen on back of his photograph. Merge his image on the cup and pour honey on top.
